import React from 'react' function Service() { const [service, setService] = useState({ name: '', description: '', rate: '', client_id: '', developer_id: '', }) function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); fetch("http://localhost:9292/clients", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(service) }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)) set({ name: '', email: '', phone_number: '', location: '', developer: '', }) } const handleChange = (e) => { setClient({ ...client, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (
) } export default Service
